comment:
* TextPaint is an extension of Paint that leaves room for some extra
 * data used during text measuring and drawing.

variables.name: bgColor
variables.comment: Special value 0 means no background paint

variables.name: underlineColor
variables.comment: * Special value 0 means no custom underline

variables.name: underlineThickness
variables.comment: * Thickness of the underline, in pixels.

methods.name: public void set(TextPaint tp)
methods.comment:
* Copy the fields from tp into this TextPaint, including the
     * fields inherited from Paint.

methods.name: public void setUnderlineText(int color, float thickness)
methods.comment:
* Defines a custom underline for this Paint.
     * @param color underline solid color
     * @param thickness underline thickness
     * @hide

methodNames: public void setUnderlineText(int color, float thickness)
